title: Anyone have these Polar Bear HOFers?
author: bounce

posts.post_title: Anyone have these Polar Bear HOFers?
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to add some cards to my Polar Bear back run.

Only collect the HOFers, ideally looking for PSA 4 / SGC 50 (4), but I'd potentially consider anything.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Looking for these:
Frank Baker
Jake Beckley
Roger Bresnahan (bat)
Mordecai Brown (Chicago)
Frank Chance (bat)
Ty Cobb (bat off)
Jimmy Collins
Sam Crawford (bat)
Hugh Duffy
Johnny Evers (Chicago)
Clark Griffith (bat)
Hughie Jennings (1 hand)
Hughie Jennings (2 hand)
Walter Johnson (pitching)
Joe Kelley
Nap Lajoie (bat)
Rube Marquard (pitching)
Christy Mathewson (dark cap)
Joe McGinnity
John McGraw (cap portrait)
Tris Speaker
Joe Tinker (bat on shoulder)
Joe Tinker (bat off shoulder)
Zack Wheat
Cy Young (glove)

Let me know, thanks
Got a SGC 30 Duffy PB coming in, if still looking ?

won a handful in REA last night, reminded me I had this thread going

let me know what you've got - get the $ directly from me instead of sharing with the AHs?!?!?  :D

I have a raw PB Cy Young. It presents well except for a large scratch on front. I don't think it will grade very well, but I have been planning to send it to SGC along with some others sometime soon. I can send you front/back scans if you'd like to take a look.
